Patients Differentiated Thyroid Cancer ( DTC ) must 131I refractory/resistant : never demonstrate 131I uptake , progression despite 131I uptake , cumulative dose 131I > 600 mCi ( last dose give least 6 month prior study entry ) . 5 .
